div.p: CodeConnexx (8-9 November, 2012, Indianapolis, IN, USA) is a two-day, one track conference that aims to bring together men and women of all ages, races, backgrounds, and skillsets interested in talking about code. The first day is focused on technical talks, centered around PHP and related topics. The second day is dedicated to all the other things that we encounter as developers: mentoring, working together on a diverse team, getting started in open source, and other topics. Free onsite childcare will be available for those who need it. We hope you can join us!
